categories: PhD Cycle Ultra Light Dazed Daisy Print Micro
description: Put as little as possible between yourself and your pedals. These ultralight, uncushioned socks let you do that while still enjoying the comfort and breathability of merino wool.Indestructawool™ construction for durability and comfort.4 Degree™ fit system holds sock securely in place.Mesh zones provide ventilation.Virtually Seamless™ toe won't chafe.Narrower profile is designed to fit women's narrower feet.
name: Smartwool PhD Cycle Ultra Light Dazed Daisy Print Micro Socks - Women's
